original_text: But if any man say unto you, this is offered in sacrifice unto idols, eat not for his sake that shewed it, and for conscience sake: for the earth is the Lord's, and the fulness thereof:
korean_text: 누가 너희에게 이것이 제물이라 말하거든 알게 한 자와 그 양심을 위하여 먹지 말라

sentences.original_text: But if any man say unto you,
this is offered in sacrifice unto idols,
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 우상에게 제물로 바쳐졌다고 할 때,

sentences.original_text: for his sake that shewed it,
for the earth is the Lord's,

sentences.korean_translation: 그 안의 가득한 모든 것도 주의 것이기 때문이다
